document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. West Palearctic (excluding north) ( Gültekin & Fremuth 2013 ).

Material examined.
152 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , ZMUM ) from 19 provinces were studied.
Cherkasy Prov.
:
4 spec. ( ZMUM ) Kaniv ,
on
Carduus
,
14.vi.1955
;
Crimea
: 2 spec. ( KUMN ) Koktebel , A. Shekhovtsov leg.,
11.vii.2009
;
1 spec. ( KUMN ) Crimean Nature Reserve , Svitla Polyana SHQ , Shatrovsky leg.,
18.vi.1980
;
2 spec. ( KUMN ) Bakhchisaray , Bohate Canyon , A. Shekhovtsov leg.,
3.viii.2009
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Khyr-Alan Mt. Range near Yalta , Alma River valley ,
24.vi.1956
;
2 spec. ( SIZK ) Bilohirsk Distr. , Bila Skelya, S. V . Volovnik ,
18.v.1983
;

2.vi.1900
;

;

.

Biology. Humid ruderal and forest habitats. Adults occur in V–VIII. Oligophagous on
Carduus
,
Cirsium Centaurea
,
Arctium
spp. ( Asteraceae ) ( Batra et al . 1971; Volovnik 1996a ; Skuhrovec & Gosik 2011 ).
